chapter.text: 100|5|arau iyara dbaraa satrau dalara abhyantarata soma'i parae.
100|6|Niscaya manuha tara pratipalakara prati atikai akrtajna
100|9|Si najane neki ye, kabarata yi ache seya ut'thita haâ€™ba
100|10|Arau antarata yi ache seya prakasita haâ€™ba
100|11|niscaya sihamtara pratipalaka se'idina sihamtara arastha samparke sabisesa arahita.
